verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: wakes] up [ARGM-TMP: at 5:30 a.m.] and watches at least four hours of cable news every day . I tried doing the same for a week .

President Donald Trump wakes up at 5:30 a.m. and watches at least four hours of cable news every day . [ARG0: I] [V: tried] [ARG1: doing the same for a week] .
